info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:37AM CDT until June 17 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR SALINE COUNTY... At 736 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Equality to near Vienna, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Saline County, including the following locations... Raleigh, Stonefort and Muddy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
